IP_SYN_4_style_3:
Coding Summary:
- 31635: Removal of foreign body (Y-stent).
- 31641: Destruction of stenosis (Cryotherapy to RMB/LMB granulation).
- 31645-59: Therapeutic aspiration (Clearance of copious purulent secretions from lower lobes, distinct from stent/cryo sites).
Medical Necessity: Management of stent complications and infection.
